article_summary:
Adrianna Hoff―The Times HeraldNORRISTOWN >> The Norristown Regional Medical Center hosted an open enrollment event Saturday for the Affordable Care Act, also known as Obamacare.
Marta Navarrte and Daniel Serrano look over patients’ options at the Norristown Regional Medical Center on DeKalb Pike, Norristown, Saturday, Nov. 15, 2014.
Norristown Regional Health Center, located at 1401 DeKalb Pike, is part of Delaware Valley Community Health, which provides medical care, social services, adult services, pediatrics and, now, health service enrollment.
Enrollment is open from now until Feb. 15, 2015, and more than 41 different health care plans are available.
The center plans to hold another open enrollment event in January.
